items.sentence: Tom thinks that personality is more important than looks.
Tom thought he should try defusing the situation quickly.
A lot of people don\'t realize how easy it is to do that.
I wish you didn\'t look like you were having so much fun.
I\'ve already forgotten what I ate for dinner last night.
I wasn\'t the one who told Tom that he couldn\'t be here.
We\'ve got to clean the living room before mom gets home.
Westbound traffic won\'t be affected by the construction.
What would happen if you didn\'t do what Tom told you to?
Tom promised that he would be more careful in the future.
Tom pulled out another document and laid it on the table.
Tom resolved the situation without resorting to violence.
Tom said he hoped Mary would be able to do that tomorrow.
You\'re the only person that can persuade Tom to do that.
You\'re supposed to be doing something else, aren\'t you?
Tom got some chewing gum stuck on the bottom of his shoe.
Tom didn\'t know what to say, so he didn\'t say anything.
Tom knew the names of every baseball player on that team.
I didn\'t want any of my friends to know I was in prison.
If there\'s something you don\'t understand, let me know.
Tom and Mary said that they talked about that last night.
Do you think that men and women can ever just be friends?
Tom was looking for his umbrella, but he didn\'t find it.
Tom wondered why Mary wasn\'t as hungry as everyone else.
Tom\'s father was diagnosed with a brain tumor last year.
Tom didn\'t know who Mary was going to go to Boston with.
Tom didn\'t take the medicine that the doctor prescribed.
Tom didn\'t want to eat the banana, but he ate it anyway.
Thanks very much for having me to dinner the other night.
That was more difficult to do than I thought it would be.
The European currencies have weakened against the dollar.
Tom told me that he thought that Mary would be impartial.
Tom took his key out of his pocket and unlocked the door.
Which do you think have more vitamin C, apples or grapes?
Tom turned himself in three days after he\'d killed Mary.
I thought you might like to see some of Tom\'s paintings.
I want to eat some Korean food that isn\'t hot and spicy.
I wish them the best of luck in dealing with the problem.
I wonder whether or not Tom has told Mary not to do that.
I guess after that many beers Tom is probably very drunk.
I have a classmate who says he can speak French fluently.
She introduced her sister to him more than two years ago.
She tried to lift the box, but found it impossible to do.
She was looking forward to playing table tennis with him.
Tom doesn\'t know what happened because he wasn\'t there.
Tom doesn\'t like speaking in French and I don\'t either.
Tom and Mary asked John to help them with their homework.
There\'s a car parked in the middle of the road up ahead.
Everybody wants to go to heaven, but nobody wants to die.
Everyone looked out the window to see what was happening.
